column4: hi guys.. is there anything specific I need to do to get amarok working in (gnome) ubuntu? I've got the packages installed, and it can scan my music collection, but hangs when it tries to add any tracks to the playlist - ideas?
all audio/video stuff works fine in other apps (e.g. totem)
be patient, it takes time to build its database
the database was built - it can't add anything to it's playlist..
